src_original: 01008 indriya-jñānam.  01009 sva-viṣaya-anantara-viṣaya-sahakāriṇā indriya-jñānena samanantarapratyayena janitaṃ tan manovijñānam.  01010 sarva-citta-caittānām ātma-saṃvedanam.  01011 bhūta-artha-bhāvanā-prakarṣa-paryantajaṃ yogijñānaṃ ca iti.
01015 arthakriyāsāmarthya-lakṣaṇatvād vastunaḥ.  01016 anyat sāmānyalakṣaṇam.  01017 so anumānasya viṣayaḥ.
01018 tad eva ca pratyakṣaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇa-phalam.  01019 artha-pratīti-rūpatvāt.  01020 artha-sārūpyam asya pramāṇam.  01021 tad-vaśād artha-pratīti-siddher iti.
